sentences.sContent: Please wait for the result of your hemoglobin test.
sentences.sContent_eng: Please wait for the result of your hemoglobin test.
sentences.sCn: 请等一下你的血红蛋白化验结果。

sentences.sContent: Some, like hemoglobin, deliver oxygen from the lungs to the far reaches of the body.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some, like hemoglobin, deliver oxygen from the lungs to the far reaches of the body.
sentences.sCn: 有些蛋白质像血红蛋白一样，可以把氧从肺部输送到身体各处。

sentences.sContent: Usually, if you or I or any nonadapted person went to high altitude, we would increase our hemoglobin levels to compensate for the low amount of oxygen.
sentences.sContent_eng: Usually, if you or I or any nonadapted person went to high altitude, we would increase our hemoglobin levels to compensate for the low amount of oxygen.
sentences.sCn: 通常，如果你、我或其他任何不适应的人去了高海拔地区，就会使体内血红蛋白的水平增高，以弥补那里低的氧气量。

trans.tranCn: [生化] 血红蛋白（等于haemoglobin）；血红素
trans.tranOther: Haemoglobin is the red substance in blood, which combines with oxygen and carries it around the body
